title: SEND A MANIAC TO CATCH A MANIAC: DEMOLITION MAN
description: A Staged Parody Fan event featuring trivia, raffle prizes, and audience participation. Starring David Rey, Lenny Thomas, Caroline Orlando, Christina Elise Perry, Laura Clare Browne, and Kirk Gostkowski. One complimentary drink with each ticket!
address: The Chain Theatre, 312 W 36 Street, 4th Floor (Between 8th and 9th ave)
cost: $5 off advance tickets with promo code "SKINT"
